summary:
(STANDALONE)
Have you ever wondered why there is only 1 voice for the children of Skyrim?
Well this mod doesn't fix that! (yet)
It adds a new fully-voiced child follower & her fully-voiced aunt instead.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3][i][u](STANDALONE)[/u][/i][/size]
Have you ever wondered why there is only 1 voice for the children of Skyrim?
Well this mod doesn't fix that! (yet)
It adds a new fully-voiced child follower instead.

[size=4][b]ATTENTION:
[/b][/size][b]Ursine uses female animations. If you use a mod that changes females animations, this will apply to her. Alternatively, you can go download a mod that makes children not use female animations.[/b]

[b][size=4]SCREENSHOTS[/size][/b]
I am open to accepting screenshots :D
I will accept every screenshot Nexus users will submit as long as they don't include nudity or skimpy-ness. (on Ursine. On Bena is fine, but all [i]parts[/i] NEED to be covered appropriately.)

[size=4][b]CREDITS[/b][/size]
Gamwich - RUSTIC Children (Ursine's body and face textures)
imAarwyn - Ursine's face texture (RUSTIC Children edited ver.)
imAarwyn - Triss' eye texture (Bena's eye texture)
(NSFW! 18+) [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?]Caliente's CBBE[/url] - Bena's body textures (NSFW! 18+)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/283148/?]apachii[/url] - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?]Apachii Skyhair[/url]
Bethesda - Skyrim & the Creation Kit
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/8671518/?]DDProductions83[/url] - custom-voiced follower tutorial
BellaDovahGaming - [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZMK2hjOIJF8]Standalone follower tutorial[/url]
INIGO - inspiration
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54527/?]Sofia: The Fully Voiced Funny Follower[/url] by finalCrystine & djjohnjarvis - inspiration
author: bunnipop and other authors
